guide.title: üìñ Taipei Travel Guide
guide.subtitle: Complete Taipei Guide
guide.about_taipei_desc: Taipei is divided into Taipei City and New Taipei City.
guide.taipei_city_desc: The political, economic, and cultural center of Taiwan, packed with attractions and restaurants.
guide.new_taipei_desc: A metropolitan area surrounding Taipei City. Larger than expected, with diverse neighborhoods offering nature, tradition, and day-trip destinations.
guide.weather_summary_note: No winter coat needed! But bring an umbrella
guide.transport_summary_note: Simpler than Seoul subway, with enough English signs!
guide.transport_overview_desc: Taipei's transit is built around the MRT (subway), with buses, taxis, bike-sharing, and airport rail tightly connected. Most attractions are accessible by MRT alone.
guide.transport_overview_tip: The MRT has expanded since 1996 and now has 131 stations, forming a large network.
guide.easycard_usage: Use it for MRT, bus, YouBike, convenience stores, and attractions.
guide.easycard_mrt_how: Tap in ‚Üí Tap out at gates
guide.easycard_bus_how: Tap on boarding + Tap on exit
guide.easycard_youbike_how: Tag card at terminal to rent/return
guide.easycard_refund_desc: Refund available at airport/MRT stations (small fee applies)
guide.transfer_tip: Transfers between MRT lines are intuitive with clear station signs ‚Äî easy even for first-timers!
guide.tip_warm: Taipei is warmer than Seoul year-round. No winter coat needed!
guide.tip_squall: Expect sudden squalls (rain showers) in summer. Bring a portable umbrella!
guide.tip_typhoon: Aug-Sep is typhoon season. Check weather before your trip.
guide.tip_ac: Indoor AC is strong, so bring a light jacket even in summer.
guide.accommodation_vibe_desc: Taipei offers a wide range from budget hostels to boutique hotels and hot spring resorts.
guide.accommodation_vibe_tip: Most areas have great MRT access, so 'which station is nearby' matters as much as the hotel quality!
guide.hostel_quality_tip: Taipei hostels are exceptionally good quality ‚Äî even budget stays are satisfying!
guide.tip_mrt_5min_desc: Taipei is an MRT city! Distance to station = travel convenience
guide.tip_ximending_base_desc: The most stress-free choice for first-timers!
guide.tip_nightmarket_desc: Taipei is more fun at night! Nearby shops matter
guide.tip_early_booking_desc: Local tourists fill rooms quickly and prices go up

support.title: Customer Support
support.description: Support and inquiries for the Taiwan Yummy Food app.
support.contact_desc:
If you encounter any issues or have questions, please contact us via email below.
We'll respond within 24 hours on business days.
support.faq_nearby: Q. How do I find restaurants nearby?
support.faq_nearby_a: Tap the 'Nearby' tab in the bottom menu to find restaurants based on your current location.
support.faq_toilet: Q. How do I find restrooms/ATMs?
support.faq_toilet_a: Tap the restroom/ATM icon at the top of the home screen to search for nearby facilities.
support.faq_schedule: Q. How do I create a custom travel itinerary?
support.faq_schedule_a: Go to the 'Plan' tab in the bottom menu, enter your travel preferences, and AI will generate a custom itinerary.
support.faq_offline: Q. Can I use the app offline?
support.faq_offline_a: Basic restaurant info is available offline, but maps and reviews require an internet connection.
support.faq_error: Q. I'm experiencing errors in the app.
support.faq_error_a: Please update to the latest version and restart. If the issue persists, contact us via the email above.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1_title: 1. Purpose of Collecting and Using Personal Information
privacy.section1_content: The "Taiwan Yummy Food" app (hereinafter "the App") collects minimal personal information to provide users with restaurant information in Taiwan. Collected information is used solely for service provision and improvement.
privacy.section2_item2: When writing reviews: author name, review content, ratings
privacy.section2_item3: Automatically collected: app usage records, access logs
privacy.section3_title: 3. Retention and Use Period of Personal Information
privacy.section3_content: Personal information is retained until account deletion. Upon request, it is destroyed without delay. However, if retention is required by law, it will be stored for the applicable period.
privacy.section4_title: 4. Sharing Personal Information with Third Parties
privacy.section4_content: The App does not share users' personal information with third parties, except when required by law.
privacy.section5_content: When the retention period expires or the purpose of processing is fulfilled, personal information is destroyed without delay.
privacy.section6_content: Users may request access, correction, deletion, or suspension of processing of their personal information at any time.
privacy.section7_content: For inquiries regarding personal information processing, please contact us below.
privacy.section8_content: This privacy policy may be modified in accordance with changes in laws and policies. Any changes will be announced within the app.
